main event: A luminous circular object appeared and disappeared several times in Stavern, Norway on 12 Sep 1954.
interesting points: The object remained visible for 55 minutes,The lower part of the object was dark while the upper part was luminous aluminum,The object disappeared at a speed many times that of sound,The sighting involved approximately fifty officers and men,The report indicates this appears to be a second-hand account.
witness description: officers and men in the area
